summary: Business website for Gadin Technologies, a foxnut export company.

existing_features.title: Create a professional multi-section landing page for Gadin Technologies, a foxnut export company. Include: a hero section with company name and tagline, an About Us section describing the company, a Products section showcasing foxnuts, a Why Choose Us section highlighting export expertise, and a Contact section with a contact form (name, email, message fields).

Implement a sticky navigation header with the Gadin Technologies logo/name and links to all page sections (Home, About, Products, Why Us, Contact). The header should be responsive and include a mobile hamburger menu.
Wire the contact form on the frontend to call the backend submission function. Show a success message after successful submission and an error message on failure.

Apply a warm, earthy visual theme throughout the site â€” inspired by nature and agriculture (think deep greens, warm tans, off-whites, and subtle gold accents). Use elegant serif or semi-serif typography for headings and clean sans-serif for body text. The layout should feel premium and trustworthy, suited to an international export business.
Render the generated static images (hero background, foxnut product image, and company logo icon) from frontend/public/assets/generated throughout the appropriate sections of the website.

In the HeroSection component, change the text color of the company name ('Gadin Technologies'), the tagline ('Nature's Finest Foxnuts, Delivered Worldwide'), and the description paragraph ('We source and export premium-grade foxnuts...') to black.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a professional business website for Gadin Technologies (foxnut exporter)
Store contact form submissions in the backend. Expose a Motoko function to save submissions (name, email, message, timestamp) and a query to retrieve them.
Change hero section text (company name, tagline, and description paragraph) to black color
